title: Funny You Should Ask...: Sometime life, and death, don't go quite according to plan
description: Isn’t it funny how something funny - can either be humorous or odd?Funny You Should Ask. Sometimes life and death don’t quite go according to plan, explores the irony, amusement and drama, of life, death and what happens in between, in six thought provoking stories - Some humorous, some odd.When our ‘hero’ Brandon (a middle-aged guy with a natural talent for mistakes) stumbles across a Genie named Duke (who also happens to be a surfer with a low boredom threshold and a terrible memory) he only has three wishes to try not to follow his usual path…Courtney is the 13 year old new girl in town – again. When six bullies think they’ve cornered her in the old warehouse outside town, they soon discover why she keeps changing towns, and families…Despite his best administrative efforts, as Paul created his comprehensive prioritised plan for the day, he completely overlooked adding the most important task: 9:05 am - Draw my final breath…What do these people, and the others inside have in common?It’s funny you should ask.They’re all about to discover that sometimes life, and death, don’t go quite according to plan...
author: Elwood  Scott
